title: Roadshows for IDBI Bank disinvestment ongoing, says Finance Ministry - Moneycontrol
content: Roadshows for IDBI Bank disinvestment ongoing, says Finance Ministry  Moneycontrol
description: Nearly a year after the Cabinet gave its in-principle approval for the strategic disinvestment and transfer of control of IDBI Bank, the government has finally started conducting roadshows to gauge investor interest in the lender.
